Description: Number of recorded accidents, as a positive integer.
Traffic fine amount, expressed in thousands of USD.
Traffic density index, scale from 0 (low) to 10 (high).
Proportion of traffic lights in the area (0 to 1).
Pavement quality, scale from 0 (very poor) to 5 (excellent).
Urban area (1) or rural area (0), as an integer.
Average speed of vehicles in km/h.
Rain intensity, scale from 0 (no rain) to 3 (heavy rain).
Estimated number of vehicles, in thousands, as an integer.
Time of day in 24-hour format (0 to 24).
